data.title: Jana Kramer & Allan Russell, & More Celebrities Who Got Married in 2024
data.meta_description: Celebrity couples who tied the knot in 2024: Jana Kramer & Allan Russell, Radhika Merchant & Anant Ambani, Paige Butcher & Eddie Murphy, etc.
data.text:
Jana Kramer & Allan Russell

Jana Kramer and Allan Russell got married at the Carnell Estate in Scotland. They wed in an intimate ceremony with 35 guests, including their children: 8-month-old son, Roman, Russell‚Äôs 16-year-old son Troy, and Kramer‚Äôs children Jolie, 8, Jace, 5, per People.

The pair have been together since 2022.

Paige Butcher & Eddie Murphy

Paige Butcher and Eddie Murphy have gotten married after being engaged for six years. Per People, the two married on July 9, 2024, in Anguilla. The ceremony was said to be intimate, with only family and friends in attendance.

For those who don‚Äôt know, the pair started dating in 2012. They got engaged in 2018, and have since welcomed two children together.

Eva Amurri & Ian Hock

Susan Sarandon‚Äôs daughter and fellow actress Eva Amurri tied the knot with her partner Ian Hock on June 29.

‚ÄúWe really wanted to center our little family unit in all of it, and make it as much about the kids as it was about us,‚Äù she told People. ‚ÄúWe worked with our officiant to craft a ceremony that felt super personal and intimate, and then focused on our second love of life: food! All we really needed was the beautiful atmosphere, our nearest and dearest, and a delicious party.‚Äù

The pair have been engaged since February 2023.

Jake Funk & Hannah Ann Sluss

Former Bachelor star Hannah Ann Sluss and NFL player Jake Funk tied the knot in a beautiful, intimate wedding in Italy on June 26.

‚ÄúWe decided it would just be us and to really focus on the commitment and significance of marriage,‚Äù Sluss told People. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs easy to get caught up in all the glitz and glam.‚Äù

‚ÄúSo having our wedding just for us made the most sense and made it meaningful,‚Äù she added.

Sluss and Funk, who got engaged in January 2023, first went public with their relationship in February 2022.

Jodi Balfour & Abbi Jacobson

Jodi Balfour and Abbi Jacobson tied the knot in an intimate and utterly romantic wedding in Brooklyn, New York.

‚ÄúWe had planned an outdoor ceremony and dinner, but we had to pivot,‚Äù Jacobson told Cultured Magazine. ‚ÄúIt was such kismet, because the ceremony was not what we expected, but it was exactly what we‚Äôd hoped for. People were packed together. When we looked out at the audience, our friends were on stools, peeking through the plants, and sitting on top of the booths. I‚Äôve never been to a wedding like that.‚Äù

Congrats to the newlyweds!

Millie Bobby Brown & Jake Bongiovi

Millie Bobby Brown and Jake Bongiovi are officially married! According to People, the couple tied the knot over the weekend of May 17.

According to The Sun, the couple‚Äôs family, including Bongiovi‚Äôs parents Jon Bon Jovi and Dorothea Bongiovi were in attendance.

‚ÄúIt was a very low-key, romantic affair with their closest family with them as they said their vows.‚Äù The newlyweds is planning a larger, ceremony later this year.

Brown and Bongiovi have been dating since 2021.

Hailie Jade Mathers & Evan McClintock.

Eminem‚Äôs daughter Hailie Jade Mathers shared on Instagram that she tied the knot with her partner, Evan McClintock.

‚ÄúWaking up a wife this week ü•≤üíç‚Å£,‚Äù she wrote in the caption alongside beautiful pictures of their wedding day.

‚Å£

‚ÄúWe couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better, more beautiful weekend celebration. So so many happy tears were shed, laughs & smiles were had, & so much love was felt,‚Äù she continued. ‚ÄúEvan and I are feeling so grateful for all of the family & friends who traveled to support us and be a part of this new chapter of our lives as husband & wife ü§ç.‚Äù

According to TMZ, Hailie shared a touching dance with her dad during the reception (see the pictures HERE!).

Captain Sandy Yawn & Leah Shafer

Below Deck Mediterranean star Sandy Yawn and her longtime girlfriend Leah Schafer are married! Yawm announced the news on Instagram alongside photos of their big day.

‚ÄúOn May 11th, 2024 I married the love of my life,‚Äù Yawn wrote in the caption. ‚ÄúI had no idea how amazing marriage could be! It feels incredible and I feel like the luckiest woman in the world.‚Äù

‚ÄúI love you, Leah Rae Yawn!! Thank you for taking my name!‚Äù she continued. ‚ÄúThank you to our entire family and friends for coming out to show your love and support to our relationship.‚Äù

Yawn and Schafer had been together since 2018. In September 2023, they got engaged.

Jaleel White & Nicoletta Ruhl

Family Matters actor Jaleel White tied the knot with tech executive Nicoletta Ruhl on May 4.

‚ÄúIt was important for all of the people that carry an impact on our daily lives to be present and for each and every one of them to enjoy themselves and feel as though they were part of something intimate and meaningful,‚Äù Ruhl told People of their beautiful Riviera Country Club wedding.

The pair debuted their relationship on New Year‚Äôs Day in 2022. Congrats to the happy couple!

Tommy Dorfman & Elise Williams

Catching us all by surprise, Tommy Dorfman announced she eloped with her girlfriend, Elise Williams, back in the fall of 2023.

‚ÄúI married my best friend and didn‚Äôt tell anyone except @hunterabrams who came and photographed us towards the end of last year,‚Äù the actress wrote on Instagram. ‚ÄúWe bought our own dresses @doverstreetmarketnewyork where I used to work before acting, and it was perfect.‚Äù

‚ÄúA few weeks ago we decided to say let‚Äôs celebrate this our way, so we [did] something for @voguemagazine and @vogueweddings because we love each other and the world should know!!!! ok???!‚Äù she continued.

‚ÄúWe do see the benefit of celebrating our love with the world,‚Äù Dorfman told Vogue. ‚ÄúAnd, frankly, the importance of people seeing trans and queer love en vogue.‚Äù

Alex Cooper & Matt Kaplan

Call Her Daddy‚Äòs Alex Cooper and Matt Kaplan have tied the knot!

The newlyweds said their ‚ÄúI do‚Äôs‚Äù in a breathtaking wedding on April 4 in Riviera Maya, Mexico, per Vogue.

‚ÄúIt was everything we wanted it to be,‚Äù Cooper told the publiocation. ‚ÄúIt was emotional, heartfelt, and we tailored it to exactly how we always envisioned it.‚Äù

Cooper and Kaplan had been together since 2020. In March 2023, the two got engaged.

Don Lemon & Tim Malone

Former CNN anchor Don Lemon tied the knot with his now-husband Tim Malone on April 6.

The pair, who had been engaged for five years, got married at the Fifth Avenue Presbyterian Church in New York City in front of 140 guests, People reports. According to the pair, who have been together since 2016, making the affair a grand occasion was all carefully thought out.

‚ÄúWe wanted to make a public statement and we wanted to involve our loved ones,‚Äù Malone told the outlet. ‚ÄúWe obviously could have easily gone to city hall. We could have used COVID as a perfect excuse to do something really quiet. But I think this is also a message. For I don‚Äôt know what percent of our guests, on both sides, but for a lot of them it‚Äôs going to be their first gay wedding.‚Äù

Chanel Iman & Davon Godchaux

Model Chanel Iman and New England Patriots defensive tackle Davon Godchaux tied the knot while on a yacht in the Caribbean Sea on Feb. 24, per Vogue.

‚ÄúWe planned the wedding the way we desired‚Äîdoing something together that we love with our kids and our blended family,‚Äù Iman told the outlet. ‚ÄúThis was our ideal, dream day. A handful of people attended the wedding‚Äîincluding my best friend and soul sister, Heidy De la Rosa‚Äîand we chartered a yacht to sail from island to island in the Caribbean Sea.‚Äù How romantic!

Usher & Jennifer Goicoechea

As if performing at the Super Bowl Halftime Show wasn‚Äôt enough, Usher made the night even more memorable by marrying his longtime girlfriend Jennifer Goicoechea. The pair, who have been together since 2019, tied the knot this weekend, People confirms.

After the big game, the couple celebrated the moment with color-coordinating white looks. Goicoechea wore an all-white off-the-shoulder pantsuit while Usher wore a white floor-sweeping fur coat over his black tuxedo.

‚ÄúWe‚Äôve obviously made a commitment for life together because of our children,‚Äù Usher told the outlet earlier this week. The singer and Goicoechea share two kids, Sovereign Bo and Sire Castrello, together. ‚ÄúIt wouldn‚Äôt be odd for us to get married. We already did here. You know what I‚Äôm saying?‚Äù

‚ÄúWe‚Äôre going to be in each other‚Äôs lives until we die, obviously, because we have something to share,‚Äù he continued. ‚ÄúThat‚Äôs beautiful. Our children. But not because of that. I really do feel like I have an amazing partner that I respect.‚Äù Congrats to the newlyweds!

Josh Radnor & Jordana Jacobs

On Jan 19, How I Met Your Mother alum Josh Radnor revealed that he and his now-wife Jordana Jacobs got married in the first week of 2024. He shared a series of photos of their wedding (which took place in a blizzard). He shared the photos with the caption reading, ‚ÄúI got married! Two weeks ago. In a *light* blizzard. It was an incredible overwhelming snowy bliss-filled weekend. So grateful to so many people I love for making the trip to @thesistersofcedarlakes to be with us. To @forgedinthenorth for the extraordinary pictures. To @samspector for the extraordinary suits. But most of all to Jordana. I can‚Äôt believe my great good fortune that I get to call this extraordinary woman my wife.‚Äù

Gerry Turner & Theresa Nist

After a whirlwind journey to find love in The Golden Bachelor last year, Gerry Turner and Theresa Nist tied the knot in a live televised ceremony on Jan. 4.

‚ÄúWe have that same deep love of family,‚Äù Nist said in her vows, per People. ‚ÄúWe have so much love to share and now so many more people to share it with.‚Äù

‚ÄúI promise to be your calm in a storm, to comfort you when you‚Äôre sad, to laugh with you when you‚Äôre happy and to stick with you throughout it all,‚Äù Nist continued. ‚ÄúBut most of all, to have fun for the rest of the days that we have left on this earth, which could be another hour.‚Äù

Turner, for his part, couldn‚Äôt stop gushing about his new wife. ‚ÄúI learned that you are the woman I can‚Äôt live without,‚Äù Turner said in his wedding vows. ‚ÄúI learned that you make me calm with the touch of your hand. I‚Äôve learned that you make me laugh with the easy comfort of a long-lost friend. I‚Äôve learned that you‚Äôre a strong and independent woman, and your strength gives me joy. I‚Äôve learned that you make me a better person, a better man, because of your sensitivity and your soft voice. And so Theresa, I know I found a full partner to share all of life‚Äôs experiences that are thrown at us.‚Äù

Congratulations to the happy couple!
